channel.title: PwnXile - Where a new dimension if formed
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2ldeeq.jpg[/img]
Hello, There are tonnes of fetures packed into this awesome remake of the offical PwnXile.
The server recently shut down because the amout of profit made from the server was very high. Me and some of the players from my server RuneTech have decided that we would bring it back to life, But it will NOT be exactly the same as that is pretty much leeching there work.
Credits to: Robbie, Ed - Original coders of PwnXile.
Development Team:
Owner: Joe, Blake. Coder: Joe Hoster: Joe
We havent bought a virtual private server hosting system yet as i have no money in my paypal or credit account. Once some donations are put in we will spend the money to keep the server up no matter what even know its going to be 24/7 anyway.
[url=http://www.pwnxile.webs.com]www.pwnxile.webs.com[/url] < Sorry no domain yet, If your so concerned that we dont have one either donate or use our old one. [url=http://www.rune-tech.com]www.rune-tech.com[/url].
Forums are built onto the website, Thanks to webs.com they allow you to create one thats not external.
Okay, There was a features list but the page refreshed by its self and it all went so i cant actuly be bothered to write those 2000 odd words again.
[code]Features: (Only a few selected ones) See troll queen King black dragon See snake lair Dagg lair with king[/code]
Ill upload more when im not tired, And my mums ill atm so ive got to keep going back and forth to her so id rather just get this done.
Media:
[url=http://pwnxile.webs.com/apps/photos/photo?photoid=177804589]http://pwnxile.webs.com/apps/photos/photo?photoid=177804589[/url] < Yes they are mine and there on our website, Its quicker then doing them one by one on tinypic.
Thanks for reading come and join today and enjoy our growing community.
[size=24pt]PwnXile[/size]

item.title: PwnXile - Where a new dimension if formed

item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Gonna go ahead and lock this before it’s spammed to death.

However mr JoesServers please do PM me with the answers to my last post.

item.title: PwnXile - Where a new dimension if formed
item.dc:creator: @eclipse_rsps eclipse rsps
item.description:
@eclipse_rsps wrote:

JoesServers:

Ruby you can love off i hate you, your a loveing mug anywayy and you can all loveing die you ugly vaginas - i dont give a love if i fail im just trying to make myself proud as i just got out of loveing jail you vaginas.

Read full topic
item.source: PwnXile - Where a new dimension if formed

item.title: PwnXile - Where a new dimension if formed
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

JoesServers:

Ruby you can love off i hate you, your a loveing mug anywayy and you can all loveing die you ugly vaginas - i dont give a love if i fail im just trying to make myself proud as i just got out of loveing jail you vaginas.

Several things I’m going to state here:

  1. We have never spoken, how can you hate that which you do not know?
  2. Aforementioned you not knowing me; how do you know if I am or am not a mug?
  3. Please don’t hurt us with your hurtful comments about our looks which you know nothing about.
  4. If you’re trying to make yourself proud, why are you using ANOTHER persons server name and ANOTHER persons playerbase?
  5. Lin already mentioned it; I didn’t know 13 year olds could go to jail either.
  6. What does you being in jail have anything to do with this?

Read full topic
item.source: PwnXile - Where a new dimension if formed

item.title: PwnXile - Where a new dimension if formed
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

JoesServers:

Ruby you can love off i hate you, your a loveing mug anywayy and you can all loveing die you ugly vaginas - i dont give a love if i fail im just trying to make myself proud as i just got out of loveing jail you vaginas.

Out of all of the people that said something bad about your server’s name, you target Ruby?

JoesServers:

Dude are you bumb, ive been a member on this account for ages, before this one i was BentonScape, so youve kinda lost it in the head and im sure ive told you all before, love off if you dont like it.

Yea… Because a month counts as ages.

Read full topic

All I’ve been doing is skilling, but honestly it’s the most fun I’ve had on a server in a while.[/quote]Date Registered: Today at 02:27:08 PMLocal Time:April 14, 2013, 10:02:27 PMLast Active: Today at 02:38:19 PM

item.title: PwnXile - Where a new dimension if formed
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

No. If you’d gotten permission from them it would have been something else, using their name to attract members is dumb - find your own player-base.

Apart from that, make the thread more appealing because this one looks hideous and needs work to be done to it. You could start out with adding pictures INSIDE the thread (most wouldn’t click on a website to just see them).

Read full topic
